title: How to take video screenshots on a PC - Quora

response.answer_text: You will need to use a Screen cast or recording software that captures live feed off your windows PC screen.This is a pretty nice software:Microsoft Expression Design 4 (Free Version)here is another one : Free Screen Recording Software - CAMSTUDIODownload Fraps 3.5.99 free version Use this link to see other nice options too:Five Best Screencasting or Screen Recording Tools Consult this video too :
